title: Watch: NY Muggers Caught on Camera Attacking 83-Year-Old Man
title_page: Watch: NY Muggers Caught on Camera Attacking 83-Year-Old Man | Breitbart
text:
Per a NY Daily News report, three muggers have been caught on camera kicking and punching an 83-year-old man right outside of his home in the Bronx.
The video shows one of the attackers run up on the elderly man and shove him before it jumps to moments later with the man laying on the ground.
One of the muggers then starts viciously punching the man while the other watched.
The one watching later kicks the victim as a third attacker joins in on the pummeling.
The three took off with the manâ€™s wallet, which held $240 and several credit cards.
Police are still looking for the trio of muggers, who they say are all of medium build and between 5-foot-6 and 5-foot-8.
The victim was taken to a nearby hospital to be treated for bruising
